Key Match Events: Aaron Jones scored 94 off just 40 balls
Jones and Gous shared a 131-run partnership off 58 balls
Dutta was greeted with a boundary by Jones
Pre-Game Insights: USA captain Patel emphasized the importance of playing fearless cricket
Canada skipper Saad Bin Zafar expected a great total from his team
Post-Match Reflections: Jones said that he likes to come in when his team is under pressure, as it brings the best out of him
Canada's Saad Bin Zafar acknowledged that his team missed their line and length, especially the spinners
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas
The USA started their T20 World Cup 2024 campaign with a barnstorming victory over traditional rivals, Canada
